labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The text gets out of the box ( in this case even out of the screen )
data.expected_result: The text should be in the limits of the box
data.short_description: When deleting a channel with a long name the text gets out of the box
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a channel with the name "w"(x100) [To do it fast: copy " WWWWWWWWWW " and paste it 10 times] - Once the channel is created you should have recreated the bug " <https://trello.com/c/3S2jKHGo> " - Now, go to "edit channel" and select " erase channel "
